meta.job_title: Sr Manager / Director / Senior Director, Software Engineering

duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive the execution and delivery of features by collaborating with multi-functional teams, architects, product owners, and engineers.
Make critical decisions that attribute to the success of the product.
Proactively foresee issues and resolve them before they occur.
Manage daily stand-ups as the Scrum Master for engineering teams.
Partner with Product Owner to align with objectives, priorities, tradeoffs, and risks.
Empower the delivery team to self-coordinate and be a multiplier for team members’ success.
Provide technical guidance, career development, and mentoring to the team.
Maintain high morale, motivate the delivery team, and advocate for technical excellence.
Participate in architecture discussions, planning, and multi-functional coordination.
Maintain and encourage the company culture by interviewing and hiring qualified individuals.
Occasionally contribute to development tasks such as coding and feature verifications.

education_certification.credential: A related technical degree required. Bachelor's degree or higher (Master's preferred)
